title: Disconnections and Loss Prevention
body:
Just played a ranked game where 3 on our team disconnected right that the beginning and also one on the other team yet there was no loss prevention

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/89413384/200072579?tab=overview

This is honestly disgusting and is a discouragement to play ranked at all

replies.body:
Loss prevented is a server-wide protocol which not only prevents players from making new games, but marks any running games as "drawn" while Riot attempts to repair the servers. It is not something they activate lightly, and not something that can be enabled on individual basis. If you lose a match due to disconnection, then you should probably look into why that happened and see if there's any possible fix for it before entering another ranked match.

>This is honestly disgusting and is a discouragement to play ranked at all

I see it as an excuse to play more League.
